#Read in data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(gt)

demographic_data_filtered <- read_csv("/Users/cristin/Dropbox/Rebecca and Tristan and Cristin/EInsight Data/demographic_data_clean.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
all_data <- read_csv("/Users/cristin/Dropbox/Rebecca and Tristan and Cristin/EInsight Data/demographic_discharge_clean.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```
#1. Did the EBP/CDEP Workstream increase access to services for targeted populations?

##1.01 Did improved access to services affect all subpopulations?

Cross-tab of study population by relevant demographic data

Total number of clients served and by demographics

###race
Cleaned race variable (recoded_race): 
- 0 if nothing is left after removal (or NA)
- 1 if exactly one valid response remains
- 2 if 2+ valid responses remain
Recoded race variable (code_num): 
codebook <- c("Asian" = 1, 
              "Black or African American" = 2, 
              "Hispanic or Latino" = 3,
              "Middle Eastern or North African" = 4,
              "Native American/American Indian or Alaska Native" = 5,
              "Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander" = 6,
              "White" = 7,
              2+ selected = 88
              )
```{r}
race_summary_all <- demographic_data_filtered %>%
  select(race) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "value") %>%
  count(variable, value) %>%
  group_by(variable) %>%
  mutate(percent = round(n / sum(n) * 100, 1)) %>%
  arrange(variable, desc(n))

race_summary_all %>% 
  knitr::kable() %>% 
  clipr::write_clip()

all_data_race_summary <- all_data %>%
  select(race) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "value") %>%
  count(variable, value) %>%
  group_by(variable) %>%
  mutate(percent = round(n / sum(n) * 100, 1)) %>%
  arrange(variable, desc(n))

all_data_race_summary %>% 
  knitr::kable() %>% 
  clipr::write_clip()

#how many selected 2+ races? 
table(demographic_data_filtered$recoded_race)

race_summary_recoded <- demographic_data_filtered %>%
  select(code_num) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "value") %>%
  count(variable, value) %>%
  group_by(variable) %>%
  mutate(percent = round(n / sum(n) * 100, 1)) %>%
  arrange(variable, desc(n))

race_summary_recoded %>% 
  knitr::kable() %>% 
  clipr::write_clip()
```
